channel.title: Run.bat Error
channel.description:
Alright, I downloaded this guys source and client but I'm having problems running the source, Compiler is working fine. Here's the code: [code]@echo off title Redemption java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause [/code]
And here's what it gives me: [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/3308u36.jpg[/img] ~ Thanks in advance

item.title: Run.bat Error
item.dc:creator: @NieX NieX
item.description:
@NieX wrote:

[quote=“bigballers, post:4, topic:451193”]no just put xmx and xms args in your batch code like…
at the end of the line: java do -xms100m -xmx2000m
Be sure to check how much your computer has for memory by doing Run>Dxdiag>Check your ram / memory and list it back or edit the xmx to how much it says (keep the m)[/quote]
Thanks mate, got it working. ++rep for you

Read full topic

item.title: Run.bat Error
item.dc:creator: @bigballers bigballers
item.description:
@bigballers wrote:

no just put xmx and xms args in your batch code like…
at the end of the line: java do -xms100m -xmx2000m
Be sure to check how much your computer has for memory by doing Run>Dxdiag>Check your ram / memory and list it back or edit the xmx to how much it says (keep the m)

Read full topic
